00019 /*      Basic typedefinitions (global), constructors and destructors
00020         for structs that needs to be initialised.
00021         @version 0.85,  last updated 4/13/1999
00022         @author René Dencker Eriksen edr@mip.sdu.dk
00023 */
00024 
00025 #include "../ipl98_setup.h"
00026 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00027 #include "kernel_string.h"
00028 #include "kernel_error.h"
00029 #include <string.h>
00030 
00031 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00032 namespace ipl{ /* use namespace if C++ */
00033 extern "C" { /* prevent name mangling for C functions */
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 void k_GetOriginString(ORIGIN Origin,char** Name)
00037 {
00038         int StrSize;
00039         char* strOrigin[20];
00040         switch(Origin){
00041         case CAMERA:
00042                 *strOrigin="CAMERA\0";
00043                 break;
00044         case DISC:
00045                 *strOrigin="DISC\0";
00046                 break;
00047         case RAM:
00048                 *strOrigin="RAM\0";
00049                 break;
00050         case EMPTY:
00051                 *strOrigin="EMPTY\0";
00052                 break;
00053         default:
00054                 {
00055                         TString str;
00056                         k_InitString(&str);
00057                         k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00058                         k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_PrintOrigin() Unknown origin (should not be possible!)");
00059                         k_EmptyString(&str);
00060                         *strOrigin="UNKNOWN?\0";
00061                 }
00062         }
00063         StrSize=(strlen(*strOrigin)+1)*sizeof(char);
00064         *Name=(char*)malloc(StrSize);
00065         memcpy(*Name,*strOrigin,StrSize);
00066         /*printf("*strOrigin=%s strlen(*strOrigin)=%d *Name=%s\n",*strOrigin,strlen(*strOrigin),*Name);*/
00067 }
00068 
00069 void k_PrintOrigin(ORIGIN Origin)
00070 {
00071         char* Name;
00072         k_GetOriginString(Origin,&Name);
00073         printf("Origin of image: %s\n",Name);
00074         free(Name);
00075 }
00076 
00077 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00078 } /* end of extern "C" */
00079 } /* end namespace ipl */
00080 #endif
